summary: Header and Footer were updated to reference a centralized BRAND logo path (/assets/generated/pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png), but the actual required PNG asset file is not shown as added in the diff summary. Additionally, WhatsApp-related UI content/links appear to have been added/expanded, which is explicitly a non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a PB Partner Hub brand logo as a transparent PNG (200x200) and add it under frontend/public/assets/generated/ using the exact filename pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show the required PNG asset being added under frontend/public/assets/generated/. Only code references to the path were added/updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded WhatsApp-related UI elements (WhatsApp link in Footer contact info and WhatsApp navigation link for admins in Header).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists WhatsApp-related changes as a non-goal, but the diff includes WhatsApp contact links and navigation.
